message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but the product is worth considerably more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $15,000 would be a fair price for the product. Thank you for considering my position.
